result.execSummary:
The defendant Ben B Vogelman was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).
  • Resisting or Obstructing an Officer, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.41(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: 3 day(s) RCJ for contempt for failure to pay.  $200 DNA surcharge assessed.
***Defendant must submit a DNA sample as required by law prior being released from jail.***
3 day(s) RCJ for contempt for failure to pay. DNA surcharge is waived on count 4.

Deft is granted huber privileges.
Consecutive to: Count 3.
***Defendant must submit a DNA sample as required by law prior being released from jail.***

ADDRESS INFO for Ben B Vogelman
Current: N2020 County Road H Lot 552, Lake Geneva, WI 53147 United States  (Effective: 06-17-2016)
Prior: 2216 Green Street, Racine, WI 53402
Per RASO - mandatory jail time has been served

Pre-trial conference at 10-01-2015 03:15 pm.
Status conference at 11-03-2015 08:30 am.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions: No contact with the victim, NS (person, property, residence or family).   It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any  alcohol.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.  The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance.  Make all court appearances on time.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

Defendant Ben B Vogelman in court with attorney Mindy M. Nolan.  Defendant Ben B Vogelman in custody.  W Richard Chiapete appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Pat Phinisee.  Reading of complaint is waived, probable cause found, p-ng, bond set.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 1, 2015 at 03:15 pm.  Status conference scheduled for November 3, 2015 at 08:30 am.
